command.elements

Class GraphicElementMoveShapeCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • command.Command
      • command.elements.GraphicElementCommand
        • command.elements.GraphicElementMoveShapeCommand

  • public class GraphicElementMoveShapeCommand
extends GraphicElementCommand
    Command which moves a given shape to a new position.
    Author:
    geomaster

      • captureCurrentState

        public void captureCurrentState()
        Records the current position of the shape as the 'previous state' i.e. state to revert to when undoing.
